original_title: Sûpâ jaiantsu - Uchûtei to jinkô eisei gekitotsu
overview: The 6th Super Giant film.  Although he was believed to be destroyed by the Nazi-like army, Super Giant breaks into the satellite, and a long, riotous battle ensues. (Part 2 of 2)
title: Super Giant: The Spaceship and the Clash of the Artificial Satellite
